summary: A documentary that follows former U.S. Labor Secretary Robert Reich as he looks to raise awareness of the country's widening economic gap.
cast: Dolly Parton|Lily Tomlin|Candice Bergen|Mary Tyler Moore|Tyne Daly|Sharon Gless|Jon Stewart|Conan O'Brien|Barack Obama|Michelle Obama|Hillary Clinton|Bill Clinton|George W. Bush|George Bush|Robert Reich|Barbara Bush|Alan Simpson|Erika Vaclav|Moises Frias|Kaycee Rasmussen|Lucas Bruch|Deborah Frias|Rebecca Stern|Brian Kersey|Lucina Parada|Isabel Frias|George Dobbins|Ryan Cantwell|Fred Wertheimer|Nick Hanauer|Fred Ross|Liz Kirk|Julia Vax|Emmanuel Saez|Nancy Rasmussen|Robert Vaclav|Thomos Meyer|Paulina Vaclav|Ladd Rassmussen|CrystalKay Fairrington|Brandon Woolf|Jesse Courtney|Carolina Vaclav|Jasiri Mshauri
title: Desigualdad para todos
